Banner Rotator Feature
  • Unlimited Rotator Items(Image and .swf Support)
  • Set in XML Rotator Width and Height, X and Y Location
  • Set in XML Number Colors and alpha values and X Y Location
  • Description Text Location(up or down) Select
  • Set in XML Rotator Auto Play and Delay Time
  • Description text width will be equal to rotator width

Gallery Feature
